name: Trouble Inn: Jonny's Room (itch)
description: The patrons of Jonny's Room weep for their loss, it is up to you to dab their tears! In this top-down, 2D, click-and-shoot, action-adventure, follow your guide as he takes you on a journey to recover what was stolen. Fight your way through combat and puzzles to test your heroic spirit. Play as another indie game hero on a vague quest for righteousness. Throw rocks, eat worms, and save the world...
